document_data.name: Clarinet
document_data.mainbody: '''Clarients''' were a type of wind instrument found in the Realms.{{Cite web/theedverse/2020-09-25 - Clarinets & Saxophones}}
document_data.Varieties: * [[Mitbiq]], a clarinet-like instrument unique to the continent of [[Zakhara]].{{Cite dragon/190/Sounds of Wonder & Delight}}
document_data.History: Originally developed on a world known as [[Earth]], the [[wizard]] [[Elminster]] one day brought some clarinets home to [[Toril]].
